name: PAN-Nordic Card Association
goal:
The Association has the obligation in the interest of its members to promote innovative infrastructure that is open for competition in the Nordic payment card market.

A Nordic Association for banks and finansial institutions issuing and acquiring payments cards in Nordics and Balitcs.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Single market
euInitiatives:
PSD2 directive and IFR regulation; EBA SCA RTS
Development in the Card payment area and related
